divs: sighting detailswent out to look at the sky as usual, but felt compelled to go out at 10:30pm for some reason. i walked out to the edge of my fence (about 30' from my back door) and looked up toward the east. just above i saw the stars, then all at once two reddish\orange oval shaped objects appeared. they flew in a straight line from south to north for about 15 seconds and disappeared into nothing! there was no sound. the lights were a dull reddish\orange and didn't seem to emit any other light around them except to themselves. they appeared out of total darkness...just all at once, and were visible for only a few seconds before instantly disappearing. i've never seen anything like these lights. i couldn't tell if they were attached to each other, but they were going the exact same speed and one was a little to the side of the other. i feel so blessed to have seen these awesome lights! i just stood there in total disbelief, feeling in my heart these were star ships from somewhere else! if i never see additional lights like these in my lifetime i will still be happy to have seen these...they were amazing!
trends: There have been no other sightings in Elma
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: Two reddish/orange silent oval shaped lights.
